name: Tag
description: Universal tag base entity with properties common to all tag types (CustomerTag, ProductTag, DocumentTag, etc.). Contains tag metadata like name, color, icon, category.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name or label of the tag

properties.name: slug
properties.description: URL-friendly version of the tag name for routing and APIs

properties.name: category
properties.description: Category or group for the tag (e.g., 'segment', 'industry', 'priority', 'status')

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of what this tag represents
properties.example: Very Important Person - top tier customer

properties.name: color
properties.description: Color code for visual representation in UI (hex color)

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Optional icon identifier for the tag

properties.name: isActive
properties.description: Whether this tag is currently active and available for assignment

properties.name: sortOrder
properties.description: Display order for sorting tags in UI
